archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Plan Maintenance (Major)
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The lack of demand data affects the major business process "Plan Maintenance", comprised of 3 main sub-processes: plan squadron operations, plain maintenance (daily) and control maintenance performed by shift. Right now, plan squadron operations are "planned" using Microsoft Ofice documents, outside any system. This process interacts with the daily planned maintenance in order to confirm the aircraft available fo rmissions.
